statements: SELECT * FROM gene_expression_data WHERE expression_level > 50;
SELECT gene_id, tissue_type, expression_level FROM gene_expression_data WHERE tissue_type = 'brain';
SELECT gene_id, expression_level FROM gene_expression_data ORDER BY expression_level DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT tissue_type FROM gene_expression_data;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_genes FROM gene_expression_data WHERE expression_level < 30;
SELECT gene_id, tissue_type, expression_level FROM gene_expression_data ORDER BY expression_level DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT gene_id, tissue_type, AVG(expression_level) AS avg_expression FROM gene_expression_data GROUP BY tissue_type ORDER BY avg_expression DESC
SELECT * FROM gene_expression_data WHERE expression_level > 50 AND tissue_type = 'Brain' ORDER BY gene_id ASC
SELECT tissue_type, COUNT(*) AS num_genes FROM gene_expression_data GROUP BY tissue_type HAVING num_genes > 5 ORDER BY num_genes DESC
SELECT gene_id, tissue_type, expression_level FROM gene_expression_data WHERE tissue_type IN ('Liver', 'Lung') ORDER BY tissue_type, gene_id ASC
SELECT gene_symbol, expression_level FROM gene_expression_data WHERE tissue_type = 'Liver';
SELECT * FROM gene_expression_data WHERE gene_id = 1001;
SELECT tissue_name, AVG(expression_level) AS avg_expression FROM gene_expression_data JOIN tissue_types ON gene_expression_data.tissue_type = tissue_types.tissue_name GROUP BY tissue_name;
SELECT gene_symbol, tissue_type, expression_level FROM gene_expression_data WHERE expression_level > 5 ORDER BY tissue_type DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT gene_id, gene_symbol FROM gene_expression_data ORDER BY gene_symbol ASC, gene_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM gene_expression_data ORDER BY gene_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT gene_id, gene_symbol FROM gene_expression_data WHERE tissue_type='Brain' AND expression_level > 0.5 ORDER BY gene_symbol ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT tissue_name, AVG(expression_level) AS average_expression FROM gene_expression_data INNER JOIN tissue_types ON gene_expression_data.tissue_type = tissue_types.tissue_name GROUP BY tissue_name
SELECT gene_id, gene_symbol, tissue_type FROM gene_expression_data WHERE expression_level BETWEEN 0.2 AND 0.8 ORDER BY tissue_type, gene_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT gene_id, gene_symbol, expression_level FROM gene_expression_data WHERE gene_symbol LIKE 'A%' OR gene_symbol LIKE 'B%' ORDER BY expression_level DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM Genes;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM Genes WHERE tissue_type = 'Heart';
SELECT gene_name, tissue_name FROM Genes JOIN Tissues ON Genes.tissue_type = Tissues.tissue_name;
SELECT AVG(expression_value) AS average_expression FROM GeneExpression;

SELECT gene_name, tissue_name, expression_value FROM Genes JOIN GeneExpression ON Genes.gene_id = GeneExpression.gene_id JOIN Tissues ON GeneExpression.tissue_id = Tissues.tissue_id WHERE expression_value > 50;
SELECT * FROM Genes;
SELECT gene_name, tissue_type FROM Genes WHERE expression_level > 50;
SELECT g.gene_name, t.tissue_name, ge.expression_value FROM Genes g INNER JOIN GeneExpression ge ON g.gene_id = ge.gene_id INNER JOIN Tissues t ON ge.tissue_id = t.tissue_id;
SELECT * FROM Tissues WHERE sample_type = 'blood' ORDER BY tissue_name DESC;
SELECT gene_id, COUNT(DISTINCT tissue_id) AS num_tissues FROM GeneExpression GROUP BY gene_id HAVING num_tissues > 2;
SELECT * FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE gene_name = 'GeneA';
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, expression_level FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE tissue_type = 'Liver';
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE expression_level > 5.0;
SELECT * FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE tissue_type = 'Heart' ORDER BY expression_level DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE gene_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE tissue_type = 'brain';
SELECT * FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE expression_level > 10 ORDER BY gene_name DESC;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, tissue_type FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE expression_level BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY tissue_type ASC, expression_level DESC;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, expression_level FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE tissue_type IN ('heart', 'liver') ORDER BY expression_level DESC, tissue_type ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT tissue_type FROM GeneExpressionData ORDER BY tissue_type;
SELECT * FROM Gene
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM Gene WHERE tissue_sample='Liver'
SELECT gene_name, tissue_sample, expression_level FROM Gene WHERE expression_level > 10
SELECT sample_name, tissue_name FROM Sample JOIN Tissue ON Sample.tissue_id = Tissue.tissue_id
SELECT experiment_name, researcher_name FROM Experiment WHERE researcher_name='John Doe'
SELECT * FROM Gene ORDER BY gene_name DESC, expression_level ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM Gene WHERE tissue_sample='Liver' AND expression_level > 0.5

SELECT a.analysis_name, g.gene_name, s.sample_name, e.experiment_name FROM Analysis a JOIN Gene g ON a.gene_id = g.gene_id JOIN Sample s ON a.sample_id = s.sample_id JOIN Experiment e ON a.experiment_id = e.experiment_id WHERE g.gene_name = 'ABC'
SELECT gene_name, AVG(expression_level) AS avg_expression FROM Gene GROUP BY gene_name HAVING AVG(expression_level) > 0.7
SELECT t.tissue_name, COUNT(s.sample_id) AS num_samples FROM Tissue t LEFT JOIN Sample s ON t.tissue_id = s.tissue_id GROUP BY t.tissue_name ORDER BY num_samples DESC
